name: The Day the Earth Scurried Around in Disarray
name_original: The Day the Earth Scurried Around in Disarray
description:
This is my submission to the messy coder game jam, in Februrary of 2022. The theme was "invasion". The game was submitted early due to other commitments at the time. I may revisit at some point and add more features, but for now this is the game jam version. Enjoy! :)

Controls:

Move: SWAD / controller left stick

Shoot: LBM / controller A button

Shoot superweapon: RMB / controller B button
